title: BRIEF-Stenprop Announces Acquisition Of Multi-Let Industrial Estates For £7.1 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Stenprop Announces Acquisition Of Multi-Let Industrial Estates For £7.1 Mln

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 09:54)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Stenprop Announces Acquisition Of Multi-Let Industrial Estates For £7.1 Mln Oct 18 (Reuters) - Stenprop Ltd : * ACQUISITION OF MULTI-LET INDUSTRIAL ESTATES FOR £7.1 MILLION * ACQUIRED TWO INDUSTRIAL ESTATES IN GLASGOW AND WOLVERHAMPTON IN SEPARATE TRANSACTIONS FOR £7.1 MILLION * WESTERN CAMPUS AT STRATHCLYDE BUSINESS PARK, BELLSHILL, GLASGOW, HAS BEEN ACQUIRED FROM CENTRAL ASSETS FOR £4.6 MILLION * MERRYHILLS ENTERPRISE PARK IN WOLVERHAMPTON HAS BEEN ACQUIRED FROM TWO PRIVATE INVESTORS FOR £2.5 MILLION

BRIEF-Stenprop Announces Acquisition Of Multi-Let Industrial Estates For £7.1 Mln
description: BRIEF-Stenprop Announces Acquisition Of Multi-Let Industrial Estates For £7.1 Mln
